author: Pearl Buck
message: The truth is always exciting. Speak it, then. Life is dull without it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
title: Thought of the day

author: Voltaire
message: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
title: Thought of the day

author: Cervantes
message: Those who will play with cats must expect to be scratched.
title: Thought of the day
